txt.en: TBD Cave-claws have long inhabited a small cavern as known as Scraper's Clough.  Defeat Cave-claws within the caverns to help clear them out.
Cave-claws have long inhabited the area known as Scraper's Clough, scraping their horns upon the sides of that rocky crag. You should put an end to the danger they pose.

Cave-claws have long inhabited the area known as Scraper's Clough, scraping their horns upon the sides of that rocky crag. They pose a deadly threat to the unwary unfortunates who might enter the Clough. You should put an end to the danger they pose.

Cave-claws have long inhabited the area known as Scraper's Clough, scraping their horns upon the sides of that rocky crag. They pose a deadly threat to the unwary unfortunates who might enter the Clough.

Cave-claws have long inhabited the area known as Scraper's Clough, scraping their horns upon the sides of that rocky crag. They pose a deadly threat to the unwary unfortunates who might enter the Clough. You should put an end to the danger they pose.

Thanks to your efforts, Scraper's Clough is clear of the cave-claw threat. The creatures will not remain away forever, but for now what few folk find themselves adventuring in that place need not fear the sharp claws or stabbing horns of those creatures.
